Description.div: Comma-separated list of database vendors to be returned as child DefaultPoolParamList elements. If this attribute is not present then the output will contain one DefaultPoolParamList element for each supported database vendor. Note if multi-dbvendor support is not enabled, then only one such element is returned.
Comma-separated list of table types to be returned in the output PoolList element. If this attribute is not present then the output PoolList will not be filtered.
